site_name: City of Hampton / Bluebird Gap Farm

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility is unable to use appropriate methods to control and treat diseases due to some expired medications/solutions.
There are bottles of expired sheep dewormer, Cydectin, and iodine, used for soaking feet, open and intermingled with
their currently used medical products. Expired medications/solutions can loose their potency and strength, leading to
ineffective or underdosed treatments for diseases or injuries. Correct by 15 January 2026 by ensuring all
medications/solutions being used to treat animals are within date and stored appropriately to maintain the effectiveness of
product.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the farm manager.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The facility is unable to use appropriate methods to control and treat diseases due to some expired medications/solutions. 
There are bottles of expired sheep dewormer, Cydectin, and iodine, used for soaking feet, open and intermingled with 
their currently used medical products. Expired medications/solutions can loose their potency and strength, leading to 
ineffective or underdosed treatments for diseases or injuries. Correct by 15 January 2026 by ensuring all 
medications/solutions being used to treat animals are within date and stored appropriately to maintain the effectiveness of 
product. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the farm manager. 
 
 n
